tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE DiseaseOutbreaks (
  outbreak_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  disease_name VARCHAR(255),
  location VARCHAR(100),
  reported_cases INT,
  reported_deaths INT,
  date_reported DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
  patient_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  age INT,
  address TEXT,
  disease_history TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Outbreaks (
  outbreak_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  disease_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  outbreak_date DATE,
  location VARCHAR(100),
  affected_population INT
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  address VARCHAR(100),
  disease VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE diagnoses (
  diagnosis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  diagnosis_date DATE,
  diagnosis_details VARCHAR(255),
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id)
)

CREATE TABLE treatments (
  treatment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  treatment_name VARCHAR(50),
  treatment_date DATE,
  treatment_details VARCHAR(255),
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id)
)

CREATE TABLE outbreaks (
  outbreak_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  disease VARCHAR(50),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  affected_patients INT
)

CREATE TABLE Patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR,
  patient_age INT,
  patient_gender VARCHAR,
  patient_location VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE Hospitals (
  hospital_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  hospital_name VARCHAR,
  hospital_location VARCHAR,
  hospital_capacity INT
)

CREATE TABLE Diseases (
  disease_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  disease_name VARCHAR,
  disease_symptoms VARCHAR,
  disease_mortality_rate FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE MedicalRecords (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  hospital_id INT,
  disease_id INT,
  record_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Outbreaks (
  outbreak_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  disease_id INT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  affected_population INT
)
